page.title: 02ATTITUDES IN ROSE GREEN
page.content: Most people in this area prefer to live in the country.Most buildings seem acceptable in appearance.The design and quality of modern buildings is thought satisfactory.County and District Councils appear to serve the area adequately.Most people are satisfied with public services though some are not happy with the health services.Most people have some form of transport and feel roads are kept satisfactorily.Provision of shops is considered reasonable.There are no strong feelings towards the youth of today.Attitudes towards old people are mostly sympathetic.The majority would like more facilities such as clubs,cinemas and sports centres. Television programmes are thought to be too violent.Tourism is looked on favourably.
